talk.utter: I understand ...but I'll bet this was human caused.

talk.author: did:plc:ncs4h36ce7sspxo7aimc5so2
talk.utter: It literally can't be, if you count the totality. Maybe someone dropped a cigarette, maybe they didn't, but the initial gesture isn't worthy of being deemed the cause. This is a fire dependent landscape, overdeveloped for decades, and impacted by climate change.

talk.author: did:plc:z5r7avw3gsmaeta7rimrxq6f
talk.utter:
All very true and good points. 
4 fires though ? And 1 far  above the others would not have been a result of embers flying backwards with those outflow winds .
It will be apocalyptic to see tomorrow. So incredibly sad
